title: [Self-Directed] Computer-Based Safety Education Design: Multimodal Instructional Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and foundational safety education theory
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in designing safety education linked to language curricula for pre-service teachers.

learning_goals: Design multimedia-based (text, images, audio) safety education materials considering diverse age groups

Learners can apply three principles of cognitive learning theories (e.g., working memory capacity, chunking) to create a checklist evaluating the accessibility of computer-based educational content (quizzes, videos, etc.) and achieve over 80% suitability in peer feedback.
Propose teaching-learning improvement strategies using formative assessment tools implementable in smartphone environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
